resource: 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000938.source=NVS 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000936.msrp=2985.00 1001150.1000851.1000856.package=true 1001150.vtc=true 1001150.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001150.1000851.1000856.description=Upgrade Package includes 17-in. alloy wheels with P265/70R17 tires, Active Traction Control (A-TRAC) (4x4 models only), electronically controlled locking rear differential [15], 115V/400-watt AC power outlet, JBL® AM/FM 6-disc CD changer with 11 speakers in seven locations including subwoofer, leather-trimmed steering wheel, exterior color-keyed door trim inserts, floating-ball Multi-Information Display with inclinometer, compass, and outside temperature, shift and transfer levers with silver accents (automatic transmissions only, transfer lever on 4x4 model only), and rear parking assist sonar 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000937.msrp=2745.00 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000938.derived=false 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000938.msrp=3155.00 1001150.1000851.1000856.title=Upgrade Package 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000936.title=Upgrade Package 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000936.source=NVS 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000937.title=Upgrade Package 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000937.derived=false 1001150.type=FIO 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000938.title=Upgrade Package 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000936.derived=false 1001150.1000851.1000856.1000937.source=NVS 1001150.derived=
